## Events

| Event            | Description                          | Type                                                   |
| ---------------- | ------------------------------------ | ------------------------------------------------------ |
| `add`            | Event whenever the value changes     | `CustomEvent<void>`                                    |
| `inputRefChange` | Event whenever the input ref changes | `CustomEvent<HTMLInputElement \| HTMLTextAreaElement>` |
| `valueChange`    | Event whenever the value changes     | `CustomEvent<number \| string>`                        |
